comments.body:
Please manually package the `license_file` and raise an issue in the source repo asking for it to be included in future source distributions. Add a link to the issue as a comment in the recipe:

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

I'm managing the source repo and thought about including the license file in the next release. But I'd rather not make a release just for that. As I think the BSD does not require a license file in the package, would it be acceptable to have none until the next release?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@  home: https://github.com/epfl-lts2/pyunlocbox
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Convex Optimization in Python using Proximal Splitting'
